title: Was the "invisible truth " of Tatanek " protected for decades?
subtitle: The Titanic drowned on the morning of April 15, 1912, promising a series of theories and deceptions for more than a century.
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: The theory that the coal fire may have accelerated the sinking of Titanic was along with the supporting images presented in a documentary in 2017 covered decades ago.
